00041 std::string TShapeSizeOrientB2::get_name() const
00042   { return "TShapeSizeOrientB2"; }

00044 TShapeSizeOrientB2::~TShapeSizeOrientB2() {}
00045 
00046 bool TShapeSizeOrientB2::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00047                                    double& result,
00048                                    MsqError& err )
00049 {
00050   double d = det(T);
00051   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(d)) {
00052     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00053     return false;
00054   }
00055   MsqMatrix<2,2> T_inv = 1/d * adj(T);
00056   pluseq_scaled_I( T_inv, -1.0 );
00057   result = sqr_Frobenius(T_inv);
00058   return true;
00059 }
00060 
00061 bool TShapeSizeOrientB2::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T, 
00062                                    double& result,
00063                                    MsqError& err)
00064 {
00065   double d = det(T);
00066   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(d)) {
00067     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00068     return false;
00069   }
00070   MsqMatrix<3,3> T_inv = 1/d * adj(T);
00071   pluseq_scaled_I( T_inv, -1.0 );
00072   result = sqr_Frobenius(T_inv);
00073   return true;
00074 }
00075 
00077 bool TShapeSizeOrientB2::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T,
00078                                              double& result,
00079                                              MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00080                                              MsqError& err )
00081 {
00082   const double tau = det(T);
00083   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) {
00084     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00085     return false;
00086   }
00087   
00088   const MsqMatrix<2,2> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00089   const double it = 1.0/tau;
00090   result = it*(it*sqr_Frobenius(T) - 2.0*trace(T)) + 2.0;
00091   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00092   deriv_wrt_T *= it*it;
00093   deriv_wrt_T(0,0) -= it;
00094   deriv_wrt_T(1,1) -= it;
00095   deriv_wrt_T += it*it*(trace(T)-it*sqr_Frobenius(T))*adjt;
00096   deriv_wrt_T *= 2.0;
00097   return true;
00098 }
00099 
00101 bool TShapeSizeOrientB2::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00102                                              double& result,
00103                                              MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00104                                              MsqError& err )
00105 {
00106   const double tau = det(T);
00107   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) {
00108     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00109     return false;
00110   }
00111   
00112   const MsqMatrix<3,3> adjt = adj(T);
00113   const double it = 1.0/tau;
00114   result = it*(it*sqr_Frobenius(adjt) - 2.0*trace(adjt)) + 3.0;
00115   
00116   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00117   deriv_wrt_T *= sqr_Frobenius(T);
00118   deriv_wrt_T -= T * transpose(T) * T;
00119   deriv_wrt_T *= it*it;
00120   
00121   deriv_wrt_T += it*it*(trace(adjt)-it*sqr_Frobenius(adjt))*transpose(adjt);
00122 
00123   double f = trace(T) * it;
00124   deriv_wrt_T(0,0) -= f;
00125   deriv_wrt_T(1,1) -= f;
00126   deriv_wrt_T(2,2) -= f;
00127   
00128   deriv_wrt_T += it*transpose(T);
00129 
00130   deriv_wrt_T *= 2.0;
00131   return true;
00132 }
00133 
00134 bool TShapeSizeOrientB2::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T,
00135                                              double& result,
00136                                              MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00137                                              MsqMatrix<2,2> second[3],
00138                                              MsqError& err )
00139 {
00140   const double tau = det(T);
00141   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) {
00142     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00143     return false;
00144   }
00145   
00146   const MsqMatrix<2,2> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00147   const double it = 1.0/tau;
00148   result = it*(it*sqr_Frobenius(T) - 2.0*trace(T)) + 2.0;
00149   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00150   deriv_wrt_T *= it*it;
00151   deriv_wrt_T(0,0) -= it;
00152   deriv_wrt_T(1,1) -= it;
00153   deriv_wrt_T += it*it*(trace(T)-it*sqr_Frobenius(T))*adjt;
00154   deriv_wrt_T *= 2.0;
00155   
00156   set_scaled_outer_product( second, it*it*it*(6*it*sqr_Frobenius(T) - 4*trace(T)), adjt );
00157   pluseq_scaled_I( second, 2*it*it );
00158   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second, 2*it*it*(trace(T) - it*sqr_Frobenius(T)) );
00159   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( second, -4*it*it*it, T, adjt );
00160   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product_I( second, 2*it*it, adjt );
00161   
00162   return true;
00163 }
00164 
00165 bool TShapeSizeOrientB2::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00166                                              double& result,
00167                                              MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00168                                              MsqMatrix<3,3> second[6],
00169                                              MsqError& err )
00170 {
00171   const double tau = det(T);
00172   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) {
00173     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00174     return false;
00175   }
00176   
00177   const MsqMatrix<3,3> adjt = adj(T);
00178   const double it = 1.0/tau;
00179   const double nadjt = sqr_Frobenius(adjt);
00180   const double nT = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00181   const double tadjT = trace(adjt);
00182   result = it*(it*nadjt - 2.0*tadjT) + 3.0;
00183   
00184   const MsqMatrix<3,3> TTtT = T * transpose(T) * T;
00185   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00186   deriv_wrt_T *= nT;
00187   deriv_wrt_T -= TTtT;
00188   deriv_wrt_T *= it*it;
00189  
00190   deriv_wrt_T += it*it*(tadjT-it*nadjt)*transpose(adjt);
00191 
00192   const double tT = trace(T);
00193   double f = tT * it;
00194   deriv_wrt_T(0,0) -= f;
00195   deriv_wrt_T(1,1) -= f;
00196   deriv_wrt_T(2,2) -= f;
00197   
00198   deriv_wrt_T += it*transpose(T);
00199 
00200   deriv_wrt_T *= 2.0;
00201   
00202   set_scaled_2nd_deriv_norm_sqr_adj( second, it*it, T );
00203 
00204   const double yf = -it*it*it*it;
00205   const double sf = -2;
00206   const double zf = -it*it*sf;
00207 
00208   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second, yf*2*nadjt*tau + zf*tadjT, T );
00209   pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second, yf*-6*nadjt - 2*zf*tadjT*it, transpose(adjt) );
00210   MsqMatrix<3,3> dnadj_dT = 2 * (nT * T - TTtT);
00211   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( second, yf * 2 * tau, dnadj_dT, transpose(adjt) );
00212   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_tr_adj( second, sf * it );
00213   MsqMatrix<3,3> dtradj_dT = -transpose(T);
00214   dtradj_dT(0,0) += tT;
00215   dtradj_dT(1,1) += tT;
00216   dtradj_dT(2,2) += tT;
00217   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( second, zf, dtradj_dT, transpose(adjt) );
00218 
00219   return true;
00220 }
